text: Maksim Shilo (; ; born 17 April 1993) is a Belarusian professional footballer. As of 2020, he plays for Dordoi Bishkek.«Дордой» усилился белорусским защитником могилёвского «Днепра» ==References== == External links == * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Belarusian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kyrgyzstan Category:FC Energetik-BGU Minsk players Category:FC Slavia Mozyr players Category:FC Smolevichi players Category:FC Luch Minsk (2012) players Category:FC Dnyapro Mogilev players Category:FC Dordoi Bishkek players
title: Maksim Shilo
